statements: SELECT * FROM LocalFoodFestivals WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT festival_name, start_date, end_date FROM LocalFoodFestivals WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT festival_id, festival_name FROM LocalFoodFestivals ORDER BY festival_name DESC
SELECT * FROM LocalFoodFestivals WHERE end_date < '2023-12-31' AND location = 'California'
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS festival_count FROM LocalFoodFestivals GROUP BY location
SELECT * FROM LocalFoodFestivals WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT festival_name, location, end_date FROM LocalFoodFestivals WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT festival_id, festival_name, location FROM LocalFoodFestivals WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY festival_name ASC;
SELECT festival_name, start_date, end_date FROM LocalFoodFestivals WHERE location = 'California' AND end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_festivals, location FROM LocalFoodFestivals GROUP BY location HAVING total_festivals > 1 ORDER BY total_festivals DESC;
SELECT * FROM local_food_festivals;
SELECT festival_name, location, start_date FROM local_food_festivals WHERE location='New York';
SELECT festival_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM local_food_festivals WHERE start_date > '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM festival_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-07-31';
SELECT festival_name, event_name FROM local_food_festivals JOIN festival_events ON local_food_festivals.festival_id = festival_events.festival_id;
SELECT * FROM local_food_festivals WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT festival_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM local_food_festivals WHERE start_date >= '2022-07-01' AND end_date <= '2022-08-31';
SELECT festival_name, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM local_food_festivals JOIN festival_events ON local_food_festivals.festival_id = festival_events.festival_id GROUP BY festival_name;
SELECT festival_name, event_name, event_description FROM local_food_festivals JOIN festival_events ON local_food_festivals.festival_id = festival_events.festival_id WHERE event_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT festival_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM local_food_festivals WHERE festival_name LIKE '%Taste%' ORDER BY end_date ASC;

SELECT festival_name, location FROM local_food_festivals ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT festival_name, start_date, end_date FROM local_food_festivals WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT reviewer_name, rating, review_text FROM festival_reviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT DISTINCT nationality FROM festival_attendees;
SELECT * FROM local_food_festivals;
SELECT festival_name, location FROM local_food_festivals WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, email, nationality FROM festival_attendees ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT festival_name, start_date, end_date FROM local_food_festivals WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT festival_reviews.review_id, festival_reviews.rating, festival_attendees.name FROM festival_reviews INNER JOIN festival_attendees ON festival_reviews.reviewer_name = festival_attendees.name;
SELECT * FROM LocalFoodFestivals;
SELECT id, name, city, country FROM LocalFoodFestivals WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM FestivalVendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text, rating FROM FestivalReviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT start_date, end_date FROM LocalFoodFestivals WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY start_date ASC;

SELECT name, city, country FROM LocalFoodFestivals ORDER BY city, start_date DESC
SELECT id, name, start_date, end_date FROM LocalFoodFestivals WHERE country = 'USA'

SELECT reviewer_name, review_text, rating FROM FestivalReviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC
SELECT * FROM local_food_festivals;
SELECT festival_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM local_food_festivals WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT organizer_name, contact_email FROM festival_organizers ORDER BY organizer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM festival_attendees WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT review_id, review_text, rating, reviewer_name, review_date FROM festival_reviews WHERE rating > 3;

SELECT attendee_name, country, registration_date FROM festival_attendees WHERE country='USA' ORDER BY registration_date ASC LIMIT 10;
